segments.text: Ugh, that overflowing sink is gross, water just pouring out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle's spreading, soaking the floor and cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's standing in it, unaware and calm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her dress might get ruined from the splashes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked on the counter, probably dirty too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids, climbing up for cookies like little thieves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are all splayed out, unstable mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy's reaching in, could drop everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl's just waiting, hand out like it's no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water damage everywhere, what a sloppy scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a clean garden, total opposite.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kitchen's turning into a swamp.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone turn off that faucet already!
segments.speaker: PAR
